title: Laxmi Flower Diamond Vanki - Bangle
materials: brilliant-cut diamonds with VS clarity. Hyderabadi Gold Polish for enduring shine.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Vanki design, this bangle showcases delicate Laxmi flower motifs intricately set with diamonds. The undulating band adds a modern touch, while the flower design evokes blessings and prosperity (Sampada).
colors: Golden yellow with sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: or as a daily wear statement piece adding a touch of elegance.
description: This Vanki seamlessly blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality diamonds and 22K gold ensures lasting value and brilliance. Its unique Laxmi flower design makes it a meaningful gift and a cherished heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a rich, long-lasting luster.
